name: Stride 2D
description:
Dodge bullets, smash glass and reach the end before the void kills you! 

This is a recreation of a very cool VR game called "Stride". I recreated this game in only a week. If you want to see the process, check my youtube video. (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaOek0fDed0-P4VHjjkP0Aw)

Thanks to:

  • Joy Way (Developers of Stride) - Original Idea and Inspiration 
  • JvstPotato - Early Access Tester
  • Hexelont - literally developing the whole game, publishing it and putting the dedication to make a youtube video while my laptop crashed 3 times  ;-; why am i thanking my self
  • Siren Cultist - For being cool B)
  • My Whole Discord Server - For being cool too! B)

Note: Yes you can slow down time forever, you should use it for occasions where the game gets too difficult for you to pass.

All jokes aside, I hope you enjoy / enjoyed the game and leave your thoughts in the comments. 

If the game is laggy on browser, you may download the application for windows. Just extract and run "Stride 2D.exe".

Any found bugs are appreciated and I will include you above if you find any. Please check out the original game because without it, this project wouldn't be a thing. (https://stride.joyway.games)
